title: Mittler
description: A connector between YouTube creators and video editing agencies, simplifying workflows and bridging the gap between content creation and editing.

challenges.challenge: Handling large video file uploads efficiently.
challenges.solution: Implemented resumable upload with chunked video processing.
Integrated Redis for optimized caching and faster API responses.

title: YAGA (Yet Another Gmail Application)
description: A robust application for managing and tokenizing Gmail data, tailored for productivity enthusiasts.

challenges.challenge: Batch processing of large email datasets.
challenges.solution: Implemented batch HTTP requests to optimize data retrieval.
Developed custom parsers to handle complex email structures.

title: Pahari Home Solution Connect
description: A mobile app for a business dealing in TMT bars, cement, and tiles, enhancing user engagement and operational efficiency.

challenges.solution: Built a custom analytics tool for detailed user behavior tracking.
Developed the app in Flutter for native performance on iOS and Android.

title: eZRx
description: An interactive healthcare app designed to streamline prescription management for healthcare professionals.

challenges.challenge: Ensuring real-time synchronization of prescription data.
challenges.solution: Integrated WebSocket technology for real-time updates.

challenges.challenge: Making the interface user-friendly for non-technical users.
challenges.solution: Designed a clean, minimalistic UI with React JS.

title: eZPharmacy
description: A pharmacy management system for inventory tracking and streamlined workflows.

challenges.challenge: Managing large inventories with high performance.
challenges.solution: Optimized database queries and implemented caching mechanisms.

challenges.challenge: Integrating barcode scanning for stock management.
challenges.solution: Utilized third-party libraries for seamless barcode integration.

title: ThirdlyUI Component Library
description: A versatile component library that enhanced the scalability and performance of a CRM system.

challenges.challenge: Building reusable components for diverse use cases.
challenges.solution: Developed modular components with TypeScript for type safety.

challenges.challenge: Improving performance in complex UI interactions.
challenges.solution: Optimized rendering logic and state management.

title: Mity Gini Palace
description: A bespoke application for managing and showcasing a jewelry business's offerings.

challenges.challenge: Creating a visually appealing interface to showcase jewelry.
challenges.solution: Incorporated modern design trends and animations for product galleries.
Integrated a reliable and secure third-party payment API.

title: NZHMS (Healthcare and Laboratory Information Management System)
description: A comprehensive HIMS and LIMS platform supporting both Outpatient Department (OPD) and Inpatient Department (IPD) workflows. This project aimed to streamline hospital and laboratory operations, improving efficiency and patient care.

challenges.challenge: Architectural decision to optimize development and scaling.
challenges.solution: Implemented a Micro-frontend architecture using Module Federation to enable independent development and deployment of modules, reducing interdependencies.

challenges.challenge: Managing consistent state and communication across multiple micro-frontends.
challenges.solution: Introduced a shared state management library and a message bus for seamless inter-module communication.

challenges.challenge: Ensuring fast load times for complex modules in a single-page application.
challenges.solution: Adopted lazy loading and code splitting techniques to minimize initial load times.

challenges.challenge: Supporting real-time updates across OPD and IPD workflows.
challenges.solution: Integrated WebSockets for real-time communication and updates for patient records and laboratory tests.

challenges.challenge: Building reusable and scalable UI components across multiple teams.
challenges.solution: Developed a shared component library with TypeScript to ensure consistency and reusability.
